message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe the product is worth a lot to me, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $13,500, which I believe is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. How about we settle on $12,000? That's a strong offer and reflects the product's true worth.
I appreciate your persistence, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
